attributes.action: To investigate all matters past and present on rape gangs in the uk
attributes.additional_details: To clean up the current system where uk residents and their families will feel safe.
attributes.background: To investigate historical evidence and how it has effectively changed today.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
